Body:
"""Test the Dictionary Tagger on a simple sentence."""
dt = DictionaryTagger(words=[['Washington'], ['Washington', 'Monument'], [
    'Washington', ',', 'D.C.']])
self.assertEqual([('The', None), ('Washington', 'B-CM'), ('Monument',
    'I-CM'), ('is', None), ('the', None), ('most', None), ('prominent',
    None), ('structure', None), ('in', None), ('Washington', 'B-CM'), (',',
    'I-CM'), ('D.C.', 'I-CM')], dt.tag(['The', 'Washington', 'Monument',
    'is', 'the', 'most', 'prominent', 'structure', 'in', 'Washington', ',',
    'D.C.']))
